question: California Bearing Ratio (CBR) test is a penetration test meant for the evaluation of

answers.a: Base strength of roads and pavements
answers.b: Subgrade strength of roads and pavements

question: Results from CBR tests are used with the empirical curves to determine

answers.a: Thickness of pavement and its component layers
answers.b: Roughness of pavement and its component layers
answers.c: Durability of pavement and its component layers

question: The CBR test can be conducted for

answers.c: measure to indicate the relative strengths of paving materials
answers.d: measure of shear strength under lateral confinement
